Schardt","username":"crschardt","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/58956e/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-02-16T23:15:44.207Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003e\u003cs\u003eThe basic Orange Pi 5 doesn’t have a fan header, so you’re probably using a Pro or a Plus.\u003c/s\u003e It turns out that V1.3 of the basic Orange Pi 5 does have a fan header (see below).\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eThe PhotonVision images are based on \u003ca href=\"https://github.com/Joshua-Riek/ubuntu-rockchip\" class=\"inline-onebox\" rel=\"noopener nofollow ugc\"\u003eGitHub - Joshua-Riek/ubuntu-rockchip: Ubuntu for Rockchip RK35XX Devices\u003c/a\u003e.
